edu.gvsu.kurmasz.zawilinski

Interface PostFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PostFilterByLanguage

    public interface PostFilter
    Classes that implement this interface determine which Pages and Revisions are removed by the post-filter.
    Author:
    Zachary Kurmas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PostFilter KEEP_ALL
      PostFilter that retains all pages and all revisions.
      static PostFilter KEEP_NONE
      PostFilter that discards all pages and all revisions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean keepPage(PageType page)
      Determines whether page should be retained or discarded.
      boolean keepRevision(RevisionType revision, PageType page)
      Determines whether revision should be retained or discarded.

    • Field Detail

      • KEEP_ALL

        static final PostFilter KEEP_ALL
        PostFilter that retains all pages and all revisions.

      • KEEP_NONE

        static final PostFilter KEEP_NONE
        PostFilter that discards all pages and all revisions.

    • Method Detail

      • keepPage

        boolean keepPage(PageType page)
        Determines whether page should be retained or discarded.
        Parameters:
        page - the PageType object under consideration
        Returns:
        true if page should be kept, false otherwise.

      • keepRevision

        boolean keepRevision(RevisionType revision,
                     PageType page)
        Determines whether revision should be retained or discarded.
        Parameters:
        revision - the RevisionType object under consideration
        page - the PageType of the object containing this revision.
        Returns:
        true if revision should be kept, false otherwise.
